section.title: Overview
section.p: This tutorial describes the use of &tool; Static Timing Analysis and Signal Integrity Analysis platform. The main purpose of this tutorial is to show the ability of the HiTAS platform to analyze designs at transistor level.
This tutorial explains how to set-up a complete Timing and SI verification flow for each component of the design, and then for the top-level. The verification flow includes the following steps:

list.item: Build a homogeneous database for each component
Perform a first analysis of timing paths
